price: Wọ́n sì fi Allāhu búra tí ìbura wọn sì ní agbára pé: “Dájúdájú tí o bá pàṣẹ fún àwọn, dájúdájú àwọn yóò jáde.” Sọ pé: “Ẹ má ṣe búra mọ́. Títẹ̀lé àṣẹ (pẹ̀lú ìbúra irọ́ ẹnu yín) ti di ohun mímọ̀ (fún wa).” Dájúdájú Allāhu ni Alámọ̀tán nípa ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe níṣẹ́.
arabic: ۞ وَأَقۡسَمُواْ بِٱللَّهِ جَهۡدَ أَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ لَئِنۡ أَمَرۡتَهُمۡ لَيَخۡرُجُنَّۖ قُل لَّا تُقۡسِمُواْۖ طَاعَةٞ مَّعۡرُوفَةٌۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
